categories: Category:Bes Ber Bikade sector star systems

nodes.text: The Validusia system was a star system located within the Bes Ber Bikade sector of the Expansion Region. It contained the Naval Station Validusia.

The system was created in part by Ansel Hsiao via the Naval Station Validusia, which he created as artwork specifically for The Essential Guide to Warfare in early 2012. The system was later identified in the Online Companion for The Essential Atlas.
